title: My Club is disappear
body: I am the leadership in the club and all my member can set a club tag but my club is disappear in my account, and I was offline in the club on other players account. Will this be Fix!?

replies.body:
We're aware of this specific issue since clubs have been re-enabled. We're currently investigating and working on a fix.

In the meantime, if you can provide me the club name and tag for the specific club you're having issues with, it will help us.

Let me know if you have any questions.

We've pushed out a fix that has resolved most of these issues, so if you're still experiencing issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this information so we can work with you to resolve this.

my case is different, im part of a club but my clubs tab has had "We ran into an error loading your clubs; try relogging to reload." this message for like 3-4 months about but ive kept my main tag until clubs went down but now its gone and i miss it {{item:3070}}  and it still has that error message for my clubs tab the club name is,   Fierce Gaming or die and its tag is xFGOD.
